title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 312.2 - Referral to conciliation processing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 312.2 - Referral to conciliation processing

State Regulations

Within 30 days of carrier's response to notice of indexing, all cases where the expected duration of benefits is 52 weeks or less shall be
referred for conciliation processing, except if a case is suitable for motion
calendar or administrative determination processing. If a case is initially
controverted, the case will be processed for a pre-hearing conference under
subdivision 2-a of section
25
of
the Workers' Compensation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
312.2

Amended, New

York State Register April 2, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 13, eff. 4/2/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
